amendment.description: An amendment numbered 101 printed in Part B of House Report 118-272 to prohibit funding for the implementation of the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention's recommendation to add the Covid vaccine to the child and adolescent immunization schedule.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Greene (GA) amendment (A044) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Greene (GA) amendment (A044) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Greene (GA) amendment (A044) Agreed to by voice vote.
